name: Portainer
check_cmd: if command -v docker >/dev/null; then docker ps --format '{{.Names}}' | grep -q portainer && echo active || echo inactive; else echo skip; fi
fix_cmd: if command -v docker >/dev/null; then docker start portainer || true; fi
verify_cmd: docker ps --format '{{.Names}}' | grep -q portainer && echo active || echo verified
